thread.title: Apple's iOS App Store suffers first major malware attack - The Raw Story
thread.title_full: Apple's iOS App Store suffers first major malware attack - The Raw Story - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The Raw Story
title: Apple's iOS App Store suffers first major malware attack - The Raw Story
text:
A sales assistant shows features of iOS 9 on an Apple iMac at an Apple reseller shop in Bangkok September 18, 2015. REUTERS/Chaiwat Subprasom said on Sunday it is cleaning up its iOS App Store to remove malicious iPhone and iPad programs identified in the first large-scale attack on the popular mobile software outlet.
 The Raw Story.
